feed.title: Shuyang Sun
feed.subtitle: I am currently a Master of Philosophy (MPhil) student in [Electrical & Information Engineering, The University of Sydney](https://sydney.edu.au/engineering/about/school-of-electrical-and-information-engineering.html) , supervised by Professor [Wanli Ouyang](http://www.ee.cuhk.edu.hk/~wlouyang/). Before that, I worked as a full-time computer vision researcher at [SenseTime](https://www.sensetime.com/), Hong Kong. I received a BEng degree in 2016 in Software Engineering from Wuhan University, China.
